directions.step:
From: arielle@taronga.com (Stephanie da Silva) (COLLECTION)
Date: Wed, 2 Mar 1994 23:07:59 GMT See recipe "Grandma Olsen's Sugar Cookies" for source/info on this recipe.
Stir dry ingredients together. Stir in oats 7 sugar, cut in butter until crumbly. Pat 1/2 crumbs in 11 x 7 pan. Spread with preserves, top with crumbs. Bake 375F for 35 minutes, cool. Makes 2-1/2 dozen.
Sharon -- Merchandising
